tool_description: Extracts and analyzes significant keywords and phrases from customer feedback to identify important themes and topics.

text.description: Customer feedback text for keyword analysis

max_keywords.description: Maximum number of keywords to extract

error_messages: Empty text: Provide text content for keyword analysis.
Invalid max_keywords: Value must be between 1 and 50.
Invalid min_frequency: Value must be a positive integer.
Text too short: Provide at least 10 words for meaningful keyword extraction.
usage: Input customer feedback text and configure extraction parameters. Returns ranked keywords and phrases with frequency and relevance scores.

top_keywords.description: Most significant keywords extracted from text

keyword_scores.description: Relevance scores for each extracted keyword

theme_summary.description: Brief summary of main themes identified
